definition: to be published (of art, literary works etc)/to come out/to take shape/to see the light of day
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
life/age/generation/era/world/lifetime/epoch/descendant/noble
surname Shi

sentences.english: What we now call conditioner appeared in the 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在使用的護髮素是在20世紀面世的。

sentences.english: This product has won good appraisement of customers since its first appearance in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 本產品自1999年面世以來廣受各地客戶的好評。
它曾承諾到2017年就能面世。

sentences.english: A few pure electric cars are already offered, and more are coming.
sentences.chinese: 一些純電力汽車也已經面世，更多的種類紛至沓來。

sentences.english: Inception is now available on Blu-ray and DVD.
sentences.chinese: 《盜夢空間》的藍光光碟和DVD碟都已經面世。

sentences.english: The first public beta was unveiled a year later.
sentences.chinese: 一年後第一個公衆測試版就面世了。

sentences.english: The monographs on criminal law have been published, but there is still room for further discussion.
sentences.chinese: 刑法研究方面雖有專著面世，但仍可續貂。

sentences.english: Hong was born in Henan Province in 1982.
Both works are on view, reunited for the first time since 1902.
sentences.chinese: 兩件作品都面世，這是自1902年以來的首次重組。

sentences.english: Would you consider a cheaper, pre-paid iPhone?
sentences.chinese: 如果低價版的iphone4S面世，你會考慮嗎？

sentences.english: The first models will be delivered next year.
sentences.chinese: 第一批模型車將於明年面世。

sentences.english: That means six new shows with higher production values and more "docu-reality."
sentences.chinese: 這就意味着將會有6個全新質量更高的電視節目面世。

sentences.english: Sarbanes-Oxley Act has been born for five years from 2002.
sentences.chinese: 自2002年起算，薩班斯法面世已逾五年。

sentences.english: He is a member of China Writers Association and has pubished three novels since 1963.
sentences.chinese: 中國作家協會會員，曾有三部長篇小說面世。

sentences.english: Therefore, when our products come into existence, they cause strong reaction in the market.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在其產品面世以來，引起市場的強烈反響。

sentences.english: New copies of the paperback edition will come out in August.
sentences.chinese: 新版平裝本將於今年8月面世。

definition: to be published/to come out
to hit the market (of a new product)
to push out/to release/to launch/to publish/to recommend
to be born
to put sth on the market
to sell strongly/to be in great demand
to sell well/hot-selling
to put effort into (work, farming, writing etc)/a masterpiece
to sell
to hit the market (of a new product)/to float (a company on the stock market)
to mass-produce
to confess one's crime/first model, version, kind etc (of gadgets, software, cars etc)
to win instant success (idiom)/to start off successfully
to sell well/best seller/chart-topping
industry
to emerge to meet a historic destiny (idiom)/to arise at an opportune time/able to take advantage of an opportunity/to rise to the occasion
